Recently, while applying the SFT model to practice, we have been working together on various tasks for the development and application of generative AI. As an open community activity, the Korea Institute of Financial Artificial Intelligence (KIFAI) is studying the super large language model LLM, and the Financial AI Assistant for the general public will be developed/opened.
